duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform electrical operation tests on HVAC units following installation of structural, electrical, and condensing components.
Verify job number, revision level of drawings, and ensure compliance with job specifications.
Inspect and test electrical control panels, wiring, air flow, sensors, and safety devices to ensure proper operation and safety.
Perform Hi Pot testing and energize units to test all components for proper operation and safety.
Operate crankcase heaters, measure amperage draws, and inspect pressure drops and fan rpm's as per engineering specifications.
Troubleshoot failed units, make defined adjustments, and document all defects.
Use a variety of tools and equipment such as multimeter, digital refrigeration gauge, temp probe, manometer, and leak detectors.

education_certification.credential: Knowledge of refrigeration operation systems and reading circuit diagrams and schematics required.
